languages.text: "К сожалению, пока мы не восстановили связь ни с одной из принадлежащих вам колоний. Однако мы надеемся, что ситуация изменится как можно скорее. Желаете ли вы получить доступную информацию о текущей ситуации в протекторате?"

"Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, пока мы не восстановили связь ни с одной из принадлежащих вам колоний. Однако мы надеемся, что ситуация изменится как можно скорее. Желаете ли вы получить доступную информацию о текущей ситуации в протекторате?"

traits.locale_text: "Do you wish to issue a decree?"
"Do you wish to issue a decree?"

"Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your trade empire?"

"Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your trade empire?"

"Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

languages.text: “遗憾的是，我们并没有恢复与任何殖民地之间的通讯。不过，希望这样的现状很快就会改变。您想了解一下您的王朝目前的状况吗？”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

traits.locale_text: “遗憾的是，我们并没有恢复与任何殖民地之间的通讯。不过，希望这样的现状很快就会改变。您想了解一下您的王朝目前的状况吗？”

languages.text: «Lamentablemente, no hemos podido restaurar las comunicaciones con ninguna de sus colonias, aunque esperamos que esa situación cambie pronto. ¿Quiere que le informe sobre el estado de la situación en su protectorado?».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

traits.locale_text: «Lamentablemente, no hemos podido restaurar las comunicaciones con ninguna de sus colonias, aunque esperamos que esa situación cambie pronto. ¿Quiere que le informe sobre el estado de la situación en su protectorado?».

languages.text: "Leider haben wir die Kommunikation mit einer Ihrer Kolonien noch nicht wiederhergestellt. Wir hoffen jedoch, dass sich die Situation sehr bald ändern wird. Möchten Sie über den aktuellen Stand der Dinge in Ihrem Protektorat unterrichtet werden?"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

languages.text: « Nous n'avons hélas pas pu rétablir les communications avec vos colonies. Nous espérons cependant remédier à ce problème sous peu. Souhaitez-vous être {mf|informé|informée} de la situation actuelle de votre protectorat ? »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous n'avons hélas pas pu rétablir les communications avec vos colonies. Nous espérons cependant remédier à ce problème sous peu. Souhaitez-vous être {mf|informé|informée} de la situation actuelle de votre protectorat ? »

languages.text: 「残念ですが、どのコロニーともまだ通信が復活していません。ですが、そのうち状況が変わることを願っています。あなたの保護領の現状についてかいつまんでご報告しましょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"

traits.locale_text: 「残念ですが、どのコロニーともまだ通信が復活していません。ですが、そのうち状況が変わることを願っています。あなたの保護領の現状についてかいつまんでご報告しましょうか？」

languages.text: "Ne yazık ki kolonilerinizle bağlantıyı henüz yeniden sağlayamadık. Ancak yakında bu durumun değişeceğini umuyoruz. Protektoranızdaki mevcut durum hakkında bilgilendirilmek ister miydiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, we have not yet restored communication with any of your colonies. However, we hope the situation will change very soon. Do you wish to be briefed on the current state of affairs in your protectorate?"
